name: Mad Armory: Last Rites
description: An offhanded whim of Mad King Thorn, made a reality by his zealous court. Executioner's tool and tombstone in one, this sword was intended for use on the king's rivals. Then as a loyal adherent of the king, are you not are an appropriate wielder?
requirement: Show your allegiance to the Lunatic Court by performing various feats while in a ghostly form from eating certain Halloween foods.
